name: Ajit Singh
bio:
He is one of the Best Legal Counsel in Civil and Criminal.

He is a very experienced and senior lawyer with a great reputation for various arbitration and litigation. His practice also encompasses Civil law, Criminal law, civil fraud, and tax.

He was also Government Pleader (GP), District Narmdapuram, Madhya Pradesh, between 2004 till 2010. He also served as Secretary & President of District Bar Association, Narmdapuram, Madhya Pradesh, and enrolled Member of MP Bar Counsel.

name: Vikram Singh
bio:
Manage farm operations including livestock management, crop cultivation, fruit and vegetable production. Specializations: Crop Production
Perform annual tasks to grow a wide variety of crops such as grains, oilseeds, sugar cane, cotton, fruits, and vegetables.
Expert in Fish Cultures and received various awards from the Government of Madhya Pradesh for successfully cultivating various varieties of fishes.
Support students and faculties in successful fish culture.

name: Purnima Raghuvanshi
bio: Born in District Narmdapuram and grew up in Madhya Pradesh. She says she was an introvert, which made her a keen observer of human behavior. She was eager to start an agribased business. So she funded this new startup and is putting efforts to make this one of the best agriculture companies in India. Her keen interest is in flower farming, especially orchids, lilies, gerberas, and roses. Protected cultivation and polyhouse farming of red and yellow capsicum are areas of interest.
